jp.ac.kobe_u.cs.cream
Class ParallelSolver

java.lang.Object
  jp.ac.kobe_u.cs.cream.Solver
      jp.ac.kobe_u.cs.cream.ParallelSolver
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable, SolutionHandler
public class ParallelSolver
extends Solver
implements SolutionHandler

Parallel solver. Only useful for the optimization problems containing Serialized constraints in the current implementation.

Since:
1.0
